title: Hinterland-S02-English.w.subs--BBC-2015-720p
description:
Hinterland

Detective drama series set in Aberystwyth against the backdrop of mountainous terrain, isolated farms and close-knit villages. Starring Richard Harrington as DCI Tom Mathias.

Season 2 - 4 Episodes

BBC (2015/2016)
 
http://www.bbc.co.uk/programmes/b03sgfbz

English language version !
_______________________________________

1280x720 resolution

Video Codec h.264
Audio Codec AAC

With subtitles - enjoy !!
_______________________________________

IMDB trivia:
Speaking scenes were filmed twice, in English and then in Welsh; the show was broadcast in both languages. (The English version was filmed first as not all the crew spoke Welsh.)
The translations are as direct as possible, but Welsh scenes, it being a more poetic language, were often accomplished with fewer words
